name: focusBot
overview: use for of loop to focus on the firstRound

messages.success: Success. Select the function next(); to complete the tutorial.

end.code: var self self = firstRound.robots.find(function(x) { return x.name == name }) for (color of allCubes) { if (self.cubes[color] > 0) { return "take" } } return "power"
